title: Firewall Error
body:
Why the fuck have i got a firewall error 2 GAMES IN A ROW

Can't enter, leaver penalty


Fix your fucking game

replies.body: By any chance do you have a firewall installed?
Even if you disable firewall, the error is still given.

Riot have recently issued a fix on their server side.

Are you still getting connection problems?

We're investigating an issue that may be giving a firewall error at the moment - check out [this thread](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/IOuWqG7B-troubleshooting-connection-issues-4032015) for more information.
The other post seems to suggest this is an issue with Spark users, is everyone experiencing the issue on a Spark plan?
Not just Spark, i'm on Optus and cant connect either
Well there goes the Spark theory :P
i also have the problem and i am using Telecom
Yep, got the same thing. Happened to me twice in a row. It's ridiculous that a multi-billion dollar company can't code a client.

Great, now I have to wait 20 minutes to get my next 5 firewall errors.

And demoted.

GG Riot
I've got this problem too atm :/
